annotation.spannedText: Annual vaccination is unnecessary and dangerous for your dog

classMention.mentionClass: Annual vaccination is unnecessary and dangerous for your dog

annotation.spannedText: most dogs will be protected for many years (and probably for life) by one round of core vaccines as puppies – usually when they’re about 16 weeks old

annotation.spannedText: after their puppy shots, most dogs don’t need to be re-vaccinated ever

annotation.spannedText: The patient receives no benefit and may be placed at serious risk when an unnecessary vaccine is given

annotation.spannedText: it cause dangerous, sometimes deadly, vaccine reactions and lifelong chronic illness … including autoimmune diseases and cancer

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinating annually is an extremely high-risk procedure … and it doesn’t make your dog any more “immune” from disease

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinating annually is an extremely high-risk procedure … and it doesn’t make your dog any more “immune” from disease

annotation.spannedText: As these corporate chains gobble up independent veterinary clinics, the trend towards over-vaccination is getting worse, not better

classMention.mentionClass: As these corporate chains gobble up independent veterinary clinics, the trend towards over-vaccination is getting worse, not better

annotation.spannedText: you have to assume profits are the real goal when you read stories like the ones I’m about to share

classMention.mentionClass: you have to assume profits are the real goal when you read stories like the ones I’m about to share

annotation.spannedText: the media has been confusing dog owners by suggesting that dogs only need to be vaccinated every three years

classMention.mentionClass: the media has been confusing dog owners by suggesting that dogs only need to be vaccinated every three years

annotation.spannedText: The article

classMention.mentionClass: The article

annotation.spannedText: Greencross clinics encourage dog owners to have their pets vaccinated annually for core vaccines (parvo, distemper and hepatitis) as well as bordetella and parainfluenza, using scare tactics like “disease outbreaks of Canine Parvovirus occur on a regular basis throughout Australia

annotation.spannedText: pets should be examined twice each year

annotation.spannedText: This gives them more opportunities to sell you extra services

annotation.spannedText: It’s certainly not about the health of the animals, even though they try to tell you it’s to protect your pet from deadly disease

annotation.spannedText: In the UK, pet owners are also being pushed to over-vaccinate their animals, thanks to a devious scheme cooked up by a big pharmaceutical company

annotation.spannedText: Intervet is shameless about teaching veterinary clinics how to sell … and make more money

classMention.mentionClass: Intervet is shameless about teaching veterinary clinics how to sell … and make more money

annotation.spannedText: it’s not hard to figure out that means the clinics are pushing annual vaccinations

classMention.mentionClass: it’s not hard to figure out that means the clinics are pushing annual vaccinations

annotation.spannedText: Intervet provides veterinary clinics with an impressive array of promotional materials to market the amnesty program

annotation.spannedText: not only are they vaccinating animals who are almost certainly already protected (because we know they’ve been vaccinated before) … they’re making them start from the beginning as if they’d never been vaccinated

classMention.mentionClass: not only are they vaccinating animals who are almost certainly already protected (because we know they’ve been vaccinated before) … they’re making them start from the beginning as if they’d never been vaccinated

annotation.spannedText: while your dog’s at the clinic, they do their best to find other ailments that need treating, as well as selling you things like dental procedures, worming and pest control medications

classMention.mentionClass: while your dog’s at the clinic, they do their best to find other ailments that need treating, as well as selling you things like dental procedures, worming and pest control medications

annotation.spannedText: Testimonials from clinics brag about how successful they were at selling additional services to people who brought their dogs in under the vaccine amnesty program

annotation.spannedText: this is a crafty way to make more money … and it’s at the expense of your dog’s health

annotation.spannedText: over-vaccination exposes your dog to the potential for a lifetime of chronic disease

annotation.spannedText: The real problem, though, is Banfield’s recommended vaccination protocol as part of their annual wellness plans

classMention.mentionClass: The real problem, though, is Banfield’s recommended vaccination protocol as part of their annual wellness plans

annotation.spannedText: These vaccines certainly should never be given routinely without consideration for the risks involved for your dog and whether he is even likely to be exposed to these diseases

classMention.mentionClass: These vaccines certainly should never be given routinely without consideration for the risks involved for your dog and whether he is even likely to be exposed to these diseases

annotation.spannedText: If you do opt for one of Banfield’s Optimal Wellness Programs, prepare yourself for a firm discussion with your vet about their vaccination schedule and don’t get pushed into annual shots for your dog
